@@Malik Saheb , 

I am a new user. Ye to khair waqt hi jyada batayega ki main bhi gayab ho jaonga ki nahin , But i would like to be in touch with you , aapko yaad hoga ki aapne meri mail ka jawab bhi  diya tha "Tarang aur lorie " ke silsile me kuch din pehle. 

Aur rahi baat aapko bulne ki to aaj kahe deta hoon ki - Jaise  Naseer Saheb ko hum  bhool nahin sakte hai waise hi  you will be always remembered. Aur aapke comments kisi star ke autograph se kam nahin hai , 
isliye aaj ye baat yaad aane par  likhi thi maine ki un saheb ki tarah aap bhi is khjane ko free me hamare liye muhaiya kara rahe hai. 

Isliye ye duty to hum logo ki kam se kam banti hi hai ki in torrents ko hamesha alive rakhen. 

Aapka Fan 
Malik.G
